about.name: Brandon Stevens
about.bio: I am a high school Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer with 6 years of experience in advanced programming and IT, along with over 3 years of experience in electrical engineering.

sections.name: experience
sections.title: Experience
sections.description: Below is some of my experience.

cards.name: dwe
cards.title: DeepWater Exploration
cards.subtitle: Chief Technology Officer, Co-Founder
description: DeepWater Exploration is a startup that empowers the future of deep-water exploration through the production of high quality components for ROV, AUV, and Marine robotics.

cards.name: camsfrc
cards.title: FIRST Robotics
cards.subtitle: FRC 687 Member
description: I competed in FIRST robotics for 2 years in my freshman and sophomore year of high school. During my time with The NerdHerd (team 687), I gained strong communication and leadership skills. On the programming subteam, I focused mostly on working with Java and a custom framework designed by the team.

cards.name: camscsc
cards.title: CAMS Computer Science & Cybersecurity Club
cards.subtitle: Board Member & Director
description: While still in high school, I have been working to develop my school's computer science and cybersecurity programs. I have helped organize events, lead workshops, and design curriculum for students to learn and develop a passion in the field. [See Website](https://camscsc.org/)

sections.name: awards
sections.title: Awards and Achievements
sections.description: Below are some of my awards and achievements.

cards.name: cyberpatriot
cards.title: CyberPatriot
cards.subtitle: Air Force Association
description: - CP-XIV Platinum Division Semifinalist (Top 150 out of 2500 Open Division teams)

cards.name: inventeam
cards.title: Lemelson MIT InvenTeams
cards.subtitle: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
description: Learn more about our invention and team [here](https://lemelson.mit.edu/teams/california-academy-mathematics-and-science-inventeam)
